outlet_generator.description: Generates outlet sheets based on a selection of unit data

append_diameter.description: Appends the diameter symbol to selected cells

clear_formatting.description: Clears conditional formatting of selected cells

link_fix.description: Fixes broken links when importing sheets from external workbooks

select_box_totals.description: selects the total of VAV boxes to use on box sheets

copy_system.description: Creates a copy of the selected head sheet
